entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:40 p.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -11.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: ENE 50 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
